snippet.title: A Ride into the Mountains Trailer
snippet.description:
A Ride into the Mountains is a retro style action game about a young man, his mounted archery skills and his mystical journey into the mountains.

The game is available for iOS and Android now.
For more info, see http://www.sunheadgames.com/aride

Links:
iPhone and iPad: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id663106965
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.leoexe.archery
